title: Mobile Language Learning Project: PBL Course Based on iTunes U

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience using mobile devices
context.additional_context: Collaborative and self-directed learning environments utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners complete three or more real-life projects using language content provided on the iTunes U platform
Learners perform interactive feedback with peer learners five or more times per week via mobile learning tools
Learners achieve over 80% proficiency in language proficiency assessments at the course conclusion
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
